Bahrain sports firm 'discontinues engagement' with mob boss Daniel Kinahan

BACK in May, Kinahan was described as an 'international boxing power broker' by KHK Sports and it was announced was to advise them across their entire portfolio, including boxing and MMA. But in a statement today, the firm said Kinahan is no longer an advisor to the company.

COVID WEDDING

Couple have special socially distanced wedding ceremony outside Cork home

TERENCE Lenihan and Tara Leguilloux tied the knot outside their Donnybrook home earlier this month. Around 20 gusts attended, with chairs spaced out to ensure social distancing. Other neighbours watched on from garden walls. Many couples are still awaiting clarity on when their big days can go ahead amid the pandemic.
